name: Amazing 7
description:
Do you want a game to kill time? No Wi-Fi ? No Problem. This game will solve it.
Amazing 7-the best and most addictive logic puzzles,with minimalism graphics. You need to think how to delete more numbers and get a higher score.

How to Play:
-Drag numbers into empty blocks
-three or more nearby numbers will merge bigger numbers
-Three 7 merged will delete surrounding numbers
-Click number can be rotated
-Delete more numbers you will get scores
-Use items will get more coins
What? One mode can’t satisfy you? Advance and Challenge mode are waiting for you
Download and play with friends to see who can get the top score!

NOTES
• Amazing 7 contain ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Amazing 7 is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Coins
